channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description:

item.description: @gingerarab @tessaapproves @NuwOne Good times back then!
item.source:markdown: @gingerarab @tessaapproves @NuwOne Good times back then!

item.description: @tessaapproves @NuwOne Looks like our son has looked through them, I don’t remember the records being upright. And yes, cassettes too! https://t.co/UqvEOFr2uL
item.source:markdown: @tessaapproves @NuwOne Looks like our son has looked through them, I don’t remember the records being upright. And yes, cassettes too! https://t.co/UqvEOFr2uL

item.description: @tessaapproves @NuwOne I think I have most of those in my basement, on a long forgotten pile of vinyl…
item.source:markdown: @tessaapproves @NuwOne I think I have most of those in my basement, on a long forgotten pile of vinyl…

item.description: @bzbear2 I just tried to get the 2nd booster 3 months after my infection, but the doc told me to wait another 3 months as I’m not in a risk group 🤷‍♂️
item.source:markdown: @bzbear2 I just tried to get the 2nd booster 3 months after my infection, but the doc told me to wait another 3 months as I’m not in a risk group 🤷‍♂️

item.description: I don’t know what your rush hour traffic is like, but we just had 15 sheep (regular sheep, not Heidschnucken) herded down our cobblestone street (by people, not dogs)
item.source:markdown: I don’t know what your rush hour traffic is like, but we just had 15 sheep (regular sheep, not Heidschnucken) herded down our cobblestone street (by people, not dogs)

item.description: @c0urtneyH You mean like Fat Tuesdays?
item.source:markdown: @c0urtneyH You mean like Fat Tuesdays?

item.description: @ClaireSmith1848 @40PercentGerman Ditto. Given true facts and a fair choice people will make good decisions. #democracy
item.source:markdown: @ClaireSmith1848 @40PercentGerman Ditto. Given true facts and a fair choice people will make good decisions. #democracy

item.description:
Thunderstorm rolling through and the temp just dropped by 5°C https://t.co/UGLwEzbyXp

Pardon me, has now dropped 15°C https://t.co/FUek557rU0

Our neighbor reported her 5 minute commute from work took 45 minutes because 5 routes she tried were blocked by fallen trees. She ended up taking a trail along a farmer’s field to get home.

We’re still hearing sirens from civil defense and fire trucks 90 minutes after the storm was over
item.source:markdown:
Thunderstorm rolling through and the temp just dropped by 5°C https://t.co/UGLwEzbyXp
Pardon me, has now dropped 15°C https://t.co/FUek557rU0
Our neighbor reported her 5 minute commute from work took 45 minutes because 5 routes she tried were blocked by fallen trees. She ended up taking a trail along a farmer’s field to get home.
We’re still hearing sirens from civil defense and fire trucks 90 minutes after the storm was over

item.description: After hooking my wife on cold brew during vacation, here’s our first attempt to make it at home. Going to be right day for it! 35°C https://t.co/Nk32cEStFT

item.description:
We’ll be in our Autobahn restaurant Sunday for Wacken return traffic (busiest day of the year for us), and I now have the appropriate business shirt for a 60-yr-old co-owner https://t.co/5yazjSvzTb

https://t.co/UQ2bW2alkK

item.description: @Regensbloggerin I generally let unrecognized numbers go to voicemail. DA is always considerate and leaves a message.
item.source:markdown: @Regensbloggerin I generally let unrecognized numbers go to voicemail. DA is always considerate and leaves a message.

item.description: @Regensbloggerin I get (very rarely) 3 kinds of spam calls: fake Microsoft, fake Europol, and Democrats Abroad 😛
item.source:markdown: @Regensbloggerin I get (very rarely) 3 kinds of spam calls: fake Microsoft, fake Europol, and Democrats Abroad 😛

item.description: Tried to get a second booster today, but was turned away as my positive PCR test was just 3 months ago. I’m to wait another 3 months. I did get a stamp in my vax book (and a QR code) for the positive test.
item.source:markdown: Tried to get a second booster today, but was turned away as my positive PCR test was just 3 months ago. I’m to wait another 3 months. I did get a stamp in my vax book (and a QR code) for the positive test.

item.description: Original survey in English: The Best & Worst Places for Expats in 2022. At least Germany (barely) avoided the bottom ten. https://t.co/mKmnUwWabf https://t.co/JeDvdTSzcz
item.source:markdown: Original survey in English: The Best & Worst Places for Expats in 2022. At least Germany (barely) avoided the bottom ten. https://t.co/mKmnUwWabf https://t.co/JeDvdTSzcz

item.description: 1. Mexiko, 2. Indonesien, 3. Taiwan… 42. Deutschland “Internationales Ranking: Das sind die besten Länder zum Auswandern” (Kriterien wie Lebensqualität, Gastfreundlichkeit, Sicherheit, Verwaltung, digitale Infrastruktur) https://t.co/W90A9gf018
